page.title: 12HOUSING
page.content: USK AND RURAL AREA - HOME OWNERSHIP Many houses in this block are privately owned. In the rural area are farms, some standing on old original sites, modernised country cottages, and later private housing in Wainfield Lane, Gwehelog. Houses from the Victorian era, 1920's, 1930's and postwar years are on the outskirts of Usk. Council Estates at Llancayo, Gwehelog and Ladyhill (outskirts of Usk) have less people renting their houses today, because, as sitting tenants, they have been able to buy their homes at a favourable price as a result of recent Government legislation. The majority of houses in the Agricultural College area are owned by the Gwent County Council and are let to staff and workers at the College. There are some bungalows on the Abergavenny Rd,and Llancayo.
